RelatedSentence: May 19 , 2014 | Filed under : Breaking News | Posted by : ' Evangelical Fellowship of Zambia ( EFZ ) Executive Director Pukuta Mwanza says there is no guarantee that the Patriotic Front will bounce back to power after the 2016 elections considering their performance so far .
